description: Add go:generate directive to copy root AGENTS.md into prompts/ at build time, embed it, and have cmdOnboard compose the output using the embedded content instead of hardcoded duplicate. Includes: go:generate in prompts.go, .gitignore for generated file, onboard.md template with placeholder, cmdOnboard fmt.Printf, and CI workflow update.
title: Embed root AGENTS.md into bw onboard via go:generate
